page.title: 04PLAYGROUND GAMES - 1985
page.content: Treacle can have as many players as you like. You need a small ball, a king, a queen, and a jack. The king puts his arm out and drops the ball. If the ball touches your leg or shoe that is called a trea touch, but if the ball goes through your legs you are on. When you are on you have to hit somebody with the ball. When the ball has gone through your legs the king, queen and jack can stay. When you hit somebody with the ball then they have to move. When you have got everybody except one boy or girl, he or she is the king. The second to last person is the queen and the third to last person is the jack.
